biotools.summary:
a reference-free filter to automatically separate host sequences and contaminants for long reads or co-barcoded reads by unsupervised clustering.

Filter contamination from filial tgs long reads or stlfr co-barcode-reads by parental kmer sets and unsupervised clustering.
